summary: This code discusses the installation of portaudio(xx)-dev on Linux, the uncertainty of OBS bindings working on Android, checking the logic for an Android broadcast app, and obtaining a virtual Termux runtime by packing it up.

details.comment: This code discusses the installation of portaudio(xx)-dev on Linux, the uncertainty of OBS bindings working on Android, checking the logic for an Android broadcast app, and obtaining a virtual Termux runtime by packing it up.
details.content:
linux needs portaudio(xx)-dev installed.
don't know if obs bindings working for android. maybe?
shall check logic for android broadcast app. demo please?
you can get a virtual termux runtime by simply packing it up.
